long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Todo App is a powerful tool that you can use to organize, track, and enhance your productivity. This user-friendly extension provides you with an easily accessible and customizable task management system.

With its powerful visual and sound effects, Todo App will provide you with a beautiful experience while also offering highly functional features.

With Todo App, you can create tasks, assign priority levels to them, reorder them by dragging and dropping, and categorize them with labels. Additionally, all data is securely stored in your browser. You can export your tasks at any time and use them on other devices.

Do you have an important task or project that should not be forgotten? Todo App is the perfect reminder and management tool for you. Set your goals, plan your tasks, and achieve success efficiently!
